attributes.action: End discriminatory COVID policies against pupils such as forcing masks in class.
attributes.additional_details: Throughout the pandemic this government has put the best intentions of the younger generations last. We are now subject to a discriminatory mask mandate within schools whilst people in offices, pubs and restaurants do not have to wear them. This is a petition for the concerned parents and students who want to end discrimination against young people.
attributes.background: I want the government to pass a law to end discriminatory COVID policies aimed at school aged children mainly the wearing of face masks. Whilst people who are at risk of dying are not subject to the same restrictions as school age children in classrooms. Who have to wear masks.
